item.title: Syrian insurgents push into Aleppo in a major setback for Assad
item.description: Insurgents were filmed outside police headquarters, in the city center, and outside the Aleppo citadel.

item.title: "48 Hours" show schedule
item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.

item.title: Hamas releases propaganda video showing Israeli-American hostage
item.description: Edan Alexander grew up in New Jersey and was a soldier in the Israeli military when Hamas militants attacked on the morning of Oct. 7, 2023.
